---

I've removed the Pro plan conditionality from the sidebar navigation. Now, all tabs—including "Request Portal" and "Admin"—will be visible to all users, regardless of their plan.

If there are any other areas in the app where Pro plan restrictions affect tab or feature visibility, let me know and I can update those as well. Would you like to remove Pro plan checks from any other part of the app, or is the sidebar change sufficient?
